EmailTemplate.description: To be sent to Airlines exclusively regarding situation of an Agent
EmailTemplate.name: SCE-EN CONFIRMATION CASS PARTICIPANT
EmailTemplate.subject: CONFIRMATION PARTICIPATION IN CASS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN
This is to confirm that XXXXXXXX ( Agent's Name)
has been participating in CASS (COUNTRY) since (CASSStart Date)
as (CASS Intermediary / CASS Associate) under Number (XX-X XXXX / XXXX).
Situation of the Agent: - Meets CASS requirements - Suspended since (SUSPENSION DATE)
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
Service Centre Europe International Air Transport Association www.iata.org/europe/cs
